div.head: 腎冷
div.div: kidney cold cold of the testicles

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: kidney cold cold of the testicles

sense.def: ① Alternative Names shen han 腎寒 , cold in the kidneys. Pathological Condition of internal abundance of yin and cold brought forth by a depletion and weakness of the kidneys and insufficiency of yang qi. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 16: 脹滿、腎冷、瘕積、泄利，灸天樞百壯 “For distension and fullness, kidney cold , conglomeration-illness accumulations, and free-flux illness cauterize the tian shu [point] one hundred times”.

② Illness Sign of cold of the testicles. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 7: 集驗療腎冷及疼，疝氣滯後，灌方 , “The Ji yan fang 集驗方 has a recipe for an enema to cure cold of the testicles and pain, elevation-illness qi, and difficult defecation”.
